Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of Gilberto Reyes
Dear Sir,
Gilberto Reyes shouldn't play at AA San Antonio Missions!
He has an AVG of .214 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Curt Leskanic
Dear Sir,
Curt Leskanic has nothing more to prove at A Vero Beach Dodgers!
He has an ERA of 2.78 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
